subject: #SSN5279
description_text:
Hi, a made the purchase a month ago and i recived the shifter, but not the
pedals, i dont have any información whatsoever in this regard, when Will i
recieve the pedals?

conversations.body_text: Hi León Maroñas,  We apologize for the delay. Two shipments destined for our German warehouse have been affected by heavy snowfall in Europe, causing road blockages and delivery delays. We will expedite delivery or explore alternative logistics channels to ship your order from China as soon as possible. Compensation will be provided based on the delay after your order is completed. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
